steps.title: Install Node.js
steps.description: Download and install Node.js from nodejs.org. Verify installation by running 'node --version' in your terminal.

steps.title: Install Git
steps.description: Download and install Git from git-scm.com. Verify installation by running 'git --version' in your terminal.

steps.title: Set up Code Editor
steps.description: Install Visual Studio Code or your preferred code editor. Install recommended extensions for JavaScript/TypeScript development.

steps.title: Clone Workshop Repository
steps.description: Clone the workshop repository using 'git clone [repo-url]' and navigate to the project directory.

steps.title: Install Dependencies
steps.description: Run 'npm install' or 'yarn install' in the project directory to install all required dependencies.

steps.title: Verify Setup
steps.description: Run 'npm start' or 'yarn start' to ensure the development server starts successfully.
